A few days ago I decided to go to a big department store in the centre of my town and to buy new shoes for me. When I came in the salesman spoke to another customer. I had to wait for ten minutes and used this possibility for looking at the shoes displayed for sale.A few days ago I decided to go to a big department store in the centre of my town and to buy new shoes for me. When I came in the salesman spoke to another customer. I had to wait for ten minutes and used this possibility for looking at the shoes displayed for sale.

details:

In several minutes the salesman asked me to try on the dark-green shoes of this model. The size was right for me. The shoes fit me perfectly. I liked the colour and came to the decision to buy them. I thanked the salesman and went to the cashdesk.
